title: Welcome to your new home! Save $1,000 Off Move-In*
posting_body: ['Save $1,000 Off Move-In*', '*Offer applies to select 2-bedroom units on a 12-month lease.', 'Must move in by 8/13/2022', 'Welcome to Valley Plaza Apartment Homes!', 'If you work in Pleasanton or the surrounding areas, Valley Plaza would be a great home for you to commute from.', 'We are centrally located near the Bart, Ace Train, 580 and 680 freeways, making it easy to get back home after a long day and relax in your peaceful newly renovated apartment.', '- In-Unit Washer & Dryer in all Apartments', '- We offer 3M -12M Leases, Month-to-Month after 1 Year', '- $0 Deposit Community', '- Microwave', '- Dishwasher', '- Separate Dining Area', '- Large Closet', '- Spacious Floorplans', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Private Balcony', '- Pet Friendly', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Swimming Pool', '- Close to Shopping', '- Close to Restaurants', '- Close to Freeway', '- Close to Schools', '- Walking distance to historical Downtown', '- Conveniently located near major retailers/shopping', '- Skylights', '- Assigned covered parking', '- Lush landscaping', '- Pool and courtyard views', '- His & her dry sauna', '- Large balcony/patio', '- High speed internet access available', '- Short-term leases available (additional fees may apply for shorter terms)', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Vaulted ceilings', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.', 'Property Code VP:ESR0377']
